QuestData.Title: The Path of Huln
QuestData.Description: Armies are vital to the success of a war. But so are symbols.$b$bFor our people, few things make for a better symbol than the blessings of our most eldest ancestors.$b$bMayla must walk the Path of Huln.$b$BThe path is dangerous, and she may only bring two people with her: a spiritwalker to guide her and a champion to protect her.$b$bWill you be the champion?
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Spiritwalker Ebonhorn on the Path of Huln.
QuestData.RewardText: Quite a drop. Mind yourself in here, this is not a safe place.

Objectives.Objective: Escort Spiritwalker Ebonhorn to the Path of Huln
